content: The Apollo 13 astronauts had to abort their mission to which celestial body due to an oxygen tank explosion?

The Apollo 13 astronauts had to abort their mission to the Moon due to an oxygen tank explosion. The explosion occurred in one of the Service Module's oxygen tanks, which caused a series of catastrophic events that threatened the lives of the crew members. As a result, the mission objective to land on the Moon had to be abandoned, and the primary focus shifted to safely returning the astronauts back to Earth.
